title: Beef and ale stew with dumplings
description: This classic stew with dumplings recipe is something that every cook should have in their repetoir.
ingredients: 1kg/2lb 3oz diced shin of beef (cut off the bone into large pieces)
salt and freshly ground black pepper
½ litre/17fl oz real ale or bitter
150g/5oz self-raising flour, sifted, plus extra for dusting
salt and freshly ground black pepper
